collections.title: Featured
collections.description: Our latest releases and most popular items!

items.name: Membership Cards
items.shortDesc: Get exclusive perks and discounts across campus!

variants.name: Fall 2025 (current)
variants.description: Get a membership card to score exclusive discounts and perks this season! Perks include: 10% off at most restaurants on-campus, 10% off all Club Merch, and Priority for Fursuit Workshops.

variants.name: Spring 2025
variants.description: Missed our previous membership card? No worries! You can still get this previous card to keep the art as a souvenir and show your support for the club. (The card will not be valid for discounts.)

variants.name: Winter 2025
variants.description: Missed our previous membership card? No worries! You can still get this previous card to keep the art as a souvenir and show your support for the club. (The card will not be valid for discounts.)

collections.title: The Howloween: Creature Feature Collection
collections.description: The exlusive merch line from our Halloween fair!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Embrace your inner spookiness with the official tee from Howloween 2025: Creature Feature! With a design featuring our Creature Feature cast that's inspired by a certain virtual band,  this shirt is perfect for showing off some Halloween spirit all year round! (We carry sizes S-XL; after payment, you'll be able to specify which shirt size you would like :3)

variants.name: 1 Bracelet
variants.description: Wear some Howloween pride on your sleeve (or more likely, on your wrist) with a Howloween Kandi bracelet! These colorful and fun accessories are perfect for adding a pop of color to your outfit and showing off some Halloween spirit.

variants.name: 2 Bracelets (Save $1)
variants.description: Wear some Howloween pride on your sleeve (or more likely, on your wrist) with Howloween Kandi bracelets! These colorful and fun accessories are perfect for adding a pop of color to your outfit and showing off some Halloween spirit. This pack of two bracelets also nets you a sweet discount!

collections.title: The Howloween: Creature Feature Poster Collection
collections.description: Decorate your space with these posters sold at our Halloween fair!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Celebrate Howloween 2025: Creature Feature with this delightfully spooky 8.5" x 11" poster! This poster is perfect for repping some Howloween spirit or for anyone who emjoys seeing the Creature Feature cast.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Celebrate the inaugural Howloween with this delightfully spooky 8.5" x 11" poster! This poster is perfect for repping some Howloween spirit or for anyone who wants to add a dash of cute spookiness to their wall.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Show some love for Triton Tails with a Tide Skateboard Poster! Inspired by comic book covers, this radical 8" x 11" design is perfect for any fan of our mascot.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Show some love for Triton Tails with a Tide Yogurt Poster! This delicious 8" x 8" design is perfect for any fan of our mascot (or frozen yoggy)!

collections.title: The Howloween: Creature Feature Sticker Collection
collections.description: Show your love for Triton Tails and Howloween with this line of stickers sold at our Halloween fair! All stickers are 3".

variants.name: default
variants.description: WAFGFGHHFDFHDFHG (he must have just came out from a midterm or something lol)

variants.name: default
variants.description: Show some love for Triton Tails with a Tide Skateboard Sticker, featuring just the radical-ness of Tide from the full poster!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Add a splash of Triton Tails to your collection with a vibrant Graffiti Sticker, featuring a unique design that captures the spirit of our club!

collections.title: The High Tide Collection
collections.description: The merch line from our previous rave festival. Shirts and stickers are still available!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Unleash your inner rave spirit with our High Tide Graffiti Tee! Featuring a vibrant design inspired by the energy of the ocean and festival vibes, this shirt is perfect for beach days and unforgettable nights. (NOTE: At this time we only have S and M sizes remaining; after payment, you'll be able to specify which shirt size you would like :3)

variants.name: 5pc
variants.description: Get all 5 stickers in the High Tide collection at a discount! All stickers are 3".

variants.name: 3pc
variants.description: Get 3 stickers from the High Tide collection at a discount! All stickers are 3".

variants.name: 1 Bracelet
variants.description: Get ready to rave with our High Tide Kandi Bracelets! These colorful and fun accessories are perfect for adding a pop of color to your outfit and showing off your love for the beach and festival culture.

variants.name: 2 Bracelets (Save $1)
variants.description: Get ready to rave with our High Tide Kandi Bracelets! These colorful and fun accessories are perfect for adding a pop of color to your outfit and showing off your love for the beach and festival culture.

collections.title: The High Tide Poster Collection
collections.description: Decorate your space with our rave festival posters!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Get all 3 posters in the High Tide collection at a 20% discount! All posters are 11" x 17".

variants.name: default
variants.description: Celebrate the debut of Lizzy and Russel with this stunning 11" x 17" poster! Featuring vibrant colors and a unique design, this poster is perfect for any fan of our DJs.

variants.name: default

variants.name: default
variants.description: Celebrate the debut of High Tide with this stunning 11" x 17" poster! Featuring vibrant colors and a unique design, this poster is perfect for any fan of our mascot.

collections.title: The Beach Vibes Collection
collections.description: Catch the waves with our mascot -- Tide the Raccoon!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Ride the waves in style with our San Diego Beach Tee! Featuring Tide the Raccoon, this shirt is perfect for sunny days and coastal vibes. (NOTE: At this time we only have S and XL sizes remaining; after payment, you'll be able to specify which shirt size you would like :3)

variants.name: default
variants.description: Show your love for Tide the Raccoon with this adorable Tide Sticker, a must-have for fans of our beach mascot!

variants.name: default
variants.description: A quirky and fun sticker to add to your collection lol. It's best not to ask too many questions.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Add a splash of tropical vibes to your collection with this vibrant Tropical Drink Sticker, featuring a refreshing design perfect for summer!

collections.title: The Wolf Sanctuary Collection
collections.description: Awoo! Proceeds go toward supporting the California Wolf Center, to help save endangered wolf populations in the U.S.

collections.title: The Fursuit Workshop Collection
collections.description: Get materials and learn to make your own fursuit at our workshops!
